title: World Championship Bundle RP Cost

embed.description: Have you been missing the spammy goodness of team emotes on broadcast? We made them even cooler! Want a new Championship skin? We've got just the ninja for you. Been waiting for us to bring back Championship Riven at long last? How about TWO RIVENS?

body: I just recently bought a championship bundle for this year, but it costs 3996 RP when I bought it (without needing to buy the champions). According to Riot, it should cost 2705 RP, so why did I have to purchase the bundle for that much?

replies.body:
As *EvilGen1us*'s post mentioned, this was a goof on our part for not clarifying that the new championship skins (Riven & Zed) would not be offered at a discount, but the rest of the bundle would. 

Let me know if you have any other questions.

http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/page/worlds-2016-hits-rift   (scroll all the way down to the comments).


RIOT please explain why the championship bundle says it is 2705 RP here if you don't need the champions, but I own all champions and the price says that it is 3996 RP??????

TeemoStoleMyCar  - about 13 hours ago

{{item:3070}} {{item:3070}} 
******Hi folks! Unfortunately, it appears there was a miscommunication here that ended up on the site - Championship Zed and Championship Riven are not intended to be on sale for 30% within this bundle, and so the total listed was incorrect. Total without champions should come to 3996RP, as you experienced (975 for Zed and Riven, 682 for Thresh, Shyvana, and Kalista). We've notified the team that handles the site, and it should be updated soon!

Riot's  Sir Stabbington  - about 6 hours ago******
It is showing up as 3996 RP on my store as well instead of the 2705 RP Riot said it should be. The store page is showing _**18% off, not 30%**_. Hopefully they fix this soon.
